entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is being levicorpused by Harry. He is described as yelling and getting hoisted up by an invisible hook.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one casting the levicorpus spell on Ron. He is described as panicking and trying to find a counter-jinx in his potion book.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is a person who is laughing at Ron's situation.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a person who is laughing at Ron's situation.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a person who falls out of bed when Ron gets levicorpused.

relationships.description: Harry casts the levicorpus spell on Ron, causing him to get hoisted up by an invisible hook.
Harry tries to cast a counter-jinx on Ron using the Liberacorpus spell.
